org.opentrafficsim.core.value.vfloat.matrix

Interface ReadOnlyFloatMatrixFunctions<U extends Unit<U>>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - Unit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FloatMatrix, FloatMatrix.Abs, FloatMatrix.Abs.Dense, FloatMatrix.Abs.Sparse, FloatMatrix.Rel, FloatMatrix.Rel.Dense, FloatMatrix.Rel.Sparse, MutableFloatMatrix, MutableFloatMatrix.Abs, MutableFloatMatrix.Abs.Dense, MutableFloatMatrix.Abs.Sparse, MutableFloatMatrix.Rel, MutableFloatMatrix.Rel.Dense, MutableFloatMatrix.Rel.Sparse

    public interface ReadOnlyFloatMatrixFunctions<U extends Unit<U>>

    • Method Detail

      • rows

        int rows()
        Returns:
        the number of rows of the matrix.

      • columns

        int columns()
        Returns:
        the number of columns of the matrix.

      • cardinality

        int cardinality()
        Returns:
        the number of cells having non-zero values; ignores tolerance.

      • getSI

        float getSI(int row,
          int column)
            throws ValueException
        Retrieve the value at a specified row and column in the SI unit in which is stored.
        Parameters:
        row - integer; row of the value to retrieve
        column - integer; column to get the value to retrieve
        Returns:
        float; value at position row, column.
        Throws:
        ValueException - if row or column out of range.

      • getInUnit

        float getInUnit(int row,
              int column)
                throws ValueException
        Retrieve the value at a specified row and column in the unit of creation.
        Parameters:
        row - integer; row of the value to retrieve
        column - integer; column to get the value to retrieve
        Returns:
        float; value at position row, column.
        Throws:
        ValueException - if row or column out of range.

      • getInUnit

        float getInUnit(int row,
              int column,
              U targetUnit)
                throws ValueException
        Retrieve the value at a specified row and column in a specified unit.
        Parameters:
        row - integer; row of the value to retrieve
        column - integer; column to get the value to retrieve
        targetUnit - U; the unit to express the value in
        Returns:
        float; value at position row, column.
        Throws:
        ValueException - if row or column out of range.

      • get

        FloatScalar<U> get(int row,
                 int column)
                                   throws ValueException
        Retrieve the value at a specified row and column as a FloatScalar.
        Parameters:
        row - integer; row of the value to retrieve
        column - integer; column to get the value to retrieve
        Returns:
        FloatScalar; value at position row, column.
        Throws:
        ValueException - if row or column out of range.

      • zSum

        float zSum()
        Returns:
        sum of all values of the vector.

      • det

        float det()
          throws ValueException
        Compute the determinant of the matrix.
        Returns:
        the determinant of the matrix
        Throws:
        ValueException - if matrix is neither sparse, nor dense, or not square
